meanings.definition: The part of a town or city that borders the sea.
meanings.sent1: Many tourists enjoy walking along the seafronts to feel the ocean breeze.
meanings.sent2: The local shops on the seafronts sell souvenirs to visitors.
meanings.sent3: The seagulls on the seafronts seem to be having a meeting about the best fishing spots.
meanings.sent4: The seafronts are like a welcoming hug from the sea to the land.
meanings.sent5: The colorful umbrellas on the seafronts create a cheerful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The area along the coast where the land meets the sea.
meanings.sent1: The seafronts are perfect for picnics with a view of the waves.
meanings.sent2: Sunsets on the seafronts are always breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The sandcastles on the seafronts were washed away by the high tide.
meanings.sent4: The seafronts hold the secrets of the tides and the whispers of the waves.
meanings.sent5: Children love playing in the shallow waters near the seafronts.

meanings.definition: The land or buildings that are next to the sea.
meanings.sent1: The cozy cottages on the seafronts offer stunning ocean views.
meanings.sent2: Restaurants on the seafronts serve delicious seafood dishes.
meanings.sent3: The lighthouse on the seafronts guides ships safely to shore.
meanings.sent4: The seafronts stand strong against the salty winds and crashing waves.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter echoes through the streets on the seafronts.
